title: Equinext and Centaur Animal Health Enter Distribution Agreement for Innovative Equine Medical Device Novobrace
author: Justin Heifetz
description: Novobrace, an injectable bioadhesive, stabilizes equine tendon and ligament injuries, including tendonitis. LEXINGTON, Ky., OLATHE, Kan. and PHILADELPHIA, June 27, 2014 -- Equinext and Centaur... | Novobrace, an injectable bioadhesive, stabilizes equine tendon and ligament injuries, including tendonitis.
